q: Eagles quarterback was named comeback player of the year, capping off an improbable season. "I thank my coaches and my teammates," said Michael Vick , who was on hand to accept his award. They got me better as an NFL player, as a quarterback, and took advantage of my talents. Michael Vick received 291/2 of the 50 votes and beat out Seahawks receiver Mike Williams( 8 votes), Vikings linebacker E.J.
